server.name: Hegar SMP
server.description:
Welcome to Hegar SMP
Hegar SMP is an SMP started on November 3rd 8:15 P.M GMT and is focused around building a world connected through lore. Everything that is build has to fit in with the lore and has to look good of course. To rise our building potential we share everything like items and farms. Personal bases are so 2018. Communism is the new cool. Eventually we want to create an epic world together with an epic story behind it. Think game of thrones or Lord of the Rings but in Minecraft. But we're also here to create friends and teach each other to become better builders


We try to stay as close to the vanilla experience but do have some quality of life and texture changes. These include:
Server:
We installed paperspigot for grief protection plug-ins and better performance
Datapacks:
2 shulker shells per shulker/Dragon drops elytra
more mob heads
durability ping
multiplayer sleep
extended blast furnace and smoker capabilities
customizable armor stands
creepers don't do damage to blocks but do still damage players by turning off mobgrieving whenever a player comes within 6 blocks of a creeper so other types of mobgrieving required for farms still work.

Texture changes:
petrified oak slabs look like course dirt slabs with a crafting recipe added as well
birch leaves are orange
paintings have changed to either look better or add things like tool racks
diorite is retextured to marble
note blocks look like crates
end stone colour matches sandstone better
blocks transition better into each other

Misc
fast travel is possible with command blocks at certain points (you can't just travel where ever you want)
fire tick is off

stuk met alle projecten die gepland staan, onder construction zijn en af zijn.
/nJoining is possible by messaging either JarPlayGo or Eelek through discord: JarPlayGo#9716 or Eelek#3702
